## âœ… Checklist

## ğŸš€ Conventional Commits

When merging this PR, use one of these commit message formats for automatic release:

### âœ¨ Feature
```bash
feat: add user export functionality
feat(api): implement real-time notifications
```

### ğŸ› Bug Fix
```bash
fix: resolve authentication timeout
fix(ui): correct button alignment on mobile
```

### ğŸš¨ Breaking Change
```bash
feat!: redesign API endpoints
# or
feat: change authentication system

BREAKING CHANGE: OAuth tokens now expire after 1 hour
```

### Other Types
```bash
docs: update API documentation
test: add integration tests
chore: update dependencies
refactor: simplify authentication logic
perf: optimize database queries
```
